syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Physics 9702

learning_objectives.description: define gravitational potential at a point as the work done per unit mass in bringing a small test mass from infinity to the point
use φ = -GM/r for the gravitational potential in the field due to a point mass
understand how the concept of gravitational potential leads to the gravitational potential energy of two point masses and use Ep = −GMm/r
